entity.name: 2020 Senate impeachment trial: Day 12
entity.description: Several US senators gave their final arguments on the impeachment trial on Tuesday. The final vote is set to take place on Wednesday and will determine whether President Trump will be acquitted or removed from office.

entity.name: Italy declares state of emergency over coronavirus
entity.description: The country also suspended flights to and from China after Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte confirmed two Chinese tourists had tested positive for the virus in Rome.
